edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.requirementmanager.view

Class MainView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JTabbedPane
            • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.requirementmanager.view.MainView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class MainView
extends javax.swing.JTabbedPane
    This class sets the main view when user goes to the RequirementManager tab It also allows opened tabs to be closed by the user
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    justinhess
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
